siteMetadata.title: Justin Jamison
siteMetadata.description: Profile site for Justin Jamison, a full-stack software developer.
siteMetadata.author: Justin Jamison
siteMetadata.bio: I am a diligent, detail-oriented, and dedicated software developer with the ability to produce high quality work. I value user-centered design, simplicity, efficiency, security, privacy, and visual appeal. I strongly believe in best practices and well-designed processes - the way in which the work is done is as important as the work itself. I enjoy and value learning, and am always seeking to improve. I am guided by a strong code of ethics that drives me in my motivation to help make the world a better place.

footer.label: Powered by the Portfolio Minimal theme
